name: SPECIAL TRUCKS CITY
description:
SPECIAL TRUCKS CITY will not be available on steam

humblebundle page

 SPECIAL TRUCKS CITY     

It is a game that makes you control old trucks found by robots and transported them to a big city and changed them and modified them to be able to accomplish certain tasks such as the transfer of large batteries and objects and your task to discover the way of work for each truck and find the items and batteries and Transfer them to different places. The city is divided into nine parts Each part contains a special task and sometimes contains the Puzzle you have to solve to complete the task.
